title: linux下官方客户端无法启动成功
txt_content:
我是linux新手。官方给的Minecraft.jar启动起在非root情况下无法启动成功
如下
inoueyoshiko@inoueyoshiko-linux-mint18 ~ $ cd /home/inoueyoshiko/桌面/Bakaxl/
inoueyoshiko@inoueyoshiko-linux-mint18 ~/桌面/Bakaxl $ java -jar Minecraft.jar 
Bootstrap (v5)
Current time is Oct 21, 2017 5:06:29 AM
System.getProperty('os.name') == 'Linux'
System.getProperty('os.version') == '4.8.0-53-generic'
System.getProperty('os.arch') == 'amd64'
System.getProperty('java.version') == '1.8.0_151'
System.getProperty('java.vendor') == 'Oracle Corporation'
System.getProperty('sun.arch.data.model') == '64'

Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma
Got reply in: 6165ms
Exception: java.io.FileNotFoundException: /home/inoueyoshiko/.minecraft/launcher.pack.lzma.new (Permission denied)
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 2/10)
Got reply in: 4852ms

Got reply in: 9984ms

Got reply in: 4024ms

Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 5/10)
Exception: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Read timed out
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 6/10)
Exception: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: connect timed out
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 7/10)
Got reply in: 7937ms
Exception: java.io.FileNotFoundException: /home/inoueyoshiko/.minecraft/launcher.pack.lzma.new (Permission denied)
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 8/10)

Unable to download remote file. Check your internet connection/proxy settings.
FATAL ERROR: net.minecraft.bootstrap.FatalBootstrapError: Unable to download while being forced
    at net.minecraft.bootstrap.Bootstrap.execute(Bootstrap.java:95)
    at net.minecraft.bootstrap.Bootstrap.main(Bootstrap.java:381)


Please fix the error and restart.

求助，linux：linuxmint18.2

replies.author: pdyx2828
replies.txt_content:
Linux用的不多
看日志是/home/inoueyoshiko/.minecraft/launcher.pack.lzma.new权限有问题
建议检查下这个文件或目录的权限

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
请使用root权限启动启动器 看样子这里是权限阻止了
你可以给个777权限上去看看

a1294790523 发表于 2017-10-21 08:11
请使用root权限启动启动器 看样子这里是权限阻止了
你可以给个777权限上去看看 ...
chmod 777 Minecraft.jar 
这个指令吗？
